column2:
"/ci1 2 Ah, <%me>!
I do apologize, but could you please assist us? Brother, we have reinforcements!"
"/ci2 2 Thank you for your assistance! I wish you a very Merry Christmas! Ehehe, what fun this is."
"They are tougher than I imagined... The pain is becoming too much... Brother, let us withdraw."

"...Brother!
Do not overstrain yourself! I shall take care of the rest!"
